As soon as I pressed the button a big Cheeto man burst through my front door with 2 beefy men at his sideğŸ’€ I was then dragged out of my own home and thrown into the back of a truck. attributes.review: anybody elseâ€™s phone crash every single time you open the app? and then once it finally loaded it asked you to do â€œchallengesâ€ and threatened to expose your information if you didnâ€™t comply? anybody else asked for their social security number, address, names and numbers of any family members and your credit card information? reminds me a lot of the blue whale game that went around a few years ago! absolutely terrified, i cried for weeks for my familyâ€™s safety but the worst part was the picture of a nude man getting a spray tan with a croissant in between his legs that filled the background of the app. heartbreaking. do not download.
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: Wish I could rate less than 1 star. First, the app installed itself on my phone but then promised it would build a wall around my phone to keep other phones out. Iâ€™m not sure what that was supposed to mean. The app also promised to be the best app ever, better than anything from China. But then I found out that itâ€™s just huge, and itâ€™s also somehow friends with Russia? How does that help me? It promised 4 minutes of amazing app usage, but all Iâ€™ve seen is 3 and a half minutes of empty promises, slander, racism, and forcibly deleting other apps from my phone. Iâ€™m not sure it even has the authority to do that, but it did... SAD!
